EmailTemplate.description: Email Template to notify the depot for pick up task
EmailTemplate.name: Depot Pre-Alert Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Alert : New Pickup Task for '{!Job__c.Job_Type__c}'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ATT: Please check Salesforce for new '{!Job__c.Job_Type__c}' pick up task ({!Job__c.Name})
({!Job__c.Link})
